name: Umbral Split
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your shadow gains a life of its own. It can take its turn after yours, following your mental orders. It can't attack, but it is otherwise an exact copy of you, including your current MP. All spells the shadow casts gain the Silent and Still tags.

The shadow can't take damage or be affected by anything, but if you are reduced to 0 hit points, the shadow instantly fades away.
empower: Your shadow sacrifices itself if you would be reduced to 0 hit points, setting your hit points equal to half your maximum hit points and negating any excess damage.
